lead_paragraph: A spate of football arrests, a protracted search for a basketball coach and nonexistent contracts have some critics saying the athletic department is out of control.
snippet: A spate of football arrests, a protracted search for a basketball coach and nonexistent contracts have some critics saying the athletic department is out of control.

headline.main: Off-Field Turmoil Causes Soul Searching at Oregon
headline.seo: Off-Field Turmoil Causes Soul Searching at Oregon
